name: pentecost
description: This consist of the client and server codes, nothing to say for now..

scripts.build: cd ./client && npm install && npm run build
scripts._: cd ./client && start npm run serve && cd ../server && start npm run start && exit
scripts.start: npm run rot && cd ./server && export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=pentecost-voice.json && NODE_ENV=production node app.js
